leadText.title: Support in tenders from application submission to victory
leadText.description: We will help you to participate in procurements under 44-FZ, 223-FZ and in commercial biddings

crumbs.text: Support of tenders of procurement participants

example1.title: Stages of participation in procurement
example1.program:
1. Obtainement and renewal of a digital signature.
  • According to No. 63-FZ "On Digital Signature", it is issued for up to 12 months and requires regular replacement.
2. Accreditation
  • Of the organization on electronic trading platforms.
3. Monitoring and selection of tenders.
  • It is necessary not only to collect suitable tenders, but also to evaluate the conditions of participation in them, requirements for providers and suppliers, securing the application and deadlines for execution. This is a significant amount of work that requires time and resources.
4. Granting a tender loan, assistance in obtaining a bank guarantee or a credit to participate in the tender.
  • Getting a guarantee or a credit is much easier and faster through a trading platform than a tender broker.Getting a guarantee or a credit is much easier and faster through a trading platform than a tender broker.
5. Preparation of documentation and submission of an application for participation in the tender.
  • This is one of the most difficult stages, since a lot of documents are required, and each customer has a list containing the requirements to all certificates and seals in them. Without considering such details, this may serve as an official reason for rejecting the application. Therefore, do not forget to conduct an examination of the application before filing.
6. Support in biddings on behalf of the organization
  • This step involves the presentation of projects, services or goods. This has its own tender specifics according to the correct customer's belief in the quality of the offered product.
7. The appeal of the results to the Federal Antimonopoly Service.
  • In case of an unsuccessful decision, it is important to correctly draft the documents for the complaint and prepare for the meeting.
8. Legal support of transactions.
  • Document management, contract verification and concluding a contract with a state, municipal or commercial customer.

cards.title: Do you want to delegate and free yourself as much as possible from the tasks of participating in procurement?
cards.text:
Holistic support
It includes the entire cycle of participation in procurement, from the obtainment of the DS to the signing of contracts with the customer based on the results of the successful biddings

cards.title: Do you plan to start with one thing: search for tenders or prepare documents without errors?
cards.text:
One-time support
Participation of specialists in solving one or more tasks for participation in the tender only at a certain stage

wrapper.title: Special tariffs for fuel and energy sector participants-Auction

tariffs.title: YOUR OWN TARIFF
tariffs.description: Choose the services that are relevant to you

tariffs.title: INDIVIDUAL
tariffs.description: Commission (% of the tenders won) depending on the selected option

tariffs.title: EASY START
tariffs.description: The price includes:Registration in the UIS and in public services (Gosuslugi). Selection of tenders on your subject for one month. Setting up a template for searching for tenders. Preparation and submission of one application on the ETP

sideCard.title: Why should one order help to participate in the biddings?

content.text:
Access to new sales channels
More than 8,000 biddings a day are being added to the trading platforms. Experts will find procurements for each business segment.

Reliability
Protection from unscrupulous customers and awareness of all changes in legislation and tenders.

Transparent work scheme
Free consultation of a personal manager and a joint choice of services / optimal tariff.
